keyMappings:
#初期化
unmap d
unmap X
unmap gs
unmap gt
unmap gT

#設定
map u restoreTab
map H goBack
map L goForward
map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map J scrollPageDown
map K scrollPageUp
map <c-[> passNextKey
searchEngines:
#グーグル系
g: http://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
y: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&tbs=qdr:y Google1year
m: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&tbs=qdr:m Google1month
w: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&tbs=qdr:w Google1week
t: https://trends.google.co.jp/trends/explore?date=today%205-y&q=%s GoogleTrends
t: https://translate.google.com/#en/ja/%s Google translate

#Qiita
q: https://qiita.com/search?q=%s Qiita
qs: https://qiita.com/search?stocked=1&q=%s Qiita stock

#その他
wiki: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/?title=Special:Search&search=%s  Wikipedia
a: http://www.amazon.co.jp/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
s: http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/%s?s=t Thesaurus
c: https://codic.jp/engine?text=%s codic
